title: 2D latitude and longitude, and incorrect longitude, in Lmon and LImon variables
description:
A small number of variables from the Lmon and LImon tables didn't have their 2D latitude and longitude coordinates converted into 1D coordinates to be consistent with other EC-Earth variables. This also prevented the longitude grid from being fixed and so longitude values are half a cell out (please see https://errata.es-doc.org/static/view.html?uid=0165ae5a-5ebf-4233-9134-99d6c440c1b8). The affected variables will be withdrawn and replaced.

All datasets have now been withdrawn and then replaced. The new version is v20200206.
